document.full_text: fox broadcasting is calling on the hitmaking power of simon cowell and steven spielberg to sustain its standing with younger viewers, with one offering up another splashy talent show and the other bringing a prehistoric world to network tv.
document.title: fox banks on dinosaurs, simon cowell in new tv lineup
lines_and_colors: fox broadcasting is calling on the hitmaking power of simon cowell and steven spielberg to sustain its standing with younger viewers, with one offering up another splashy talent show and the other bringing a prehistoric world to network tv.
